articles.author: Laura A. Bischoff
articles.title: Racist text messages spamming Black Americans in Ohio, across U.S. - The Columbus Dispatch
articles.description: Racist text messages are being sent to Black Americans in multiple states, including Ohio.
articles.content:
Racist text messages are being sent to Black Americans in Ohio and around the nation, telling them they're selected to be enslaved and assigned to pick cotton on a plantation.
The widespread message… [+3176 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Mason
articles.title: Biden urges Americans to 'bring down the temperature' after Trump's US election win - Reuters
articles.description: Following Trump's victory he sought to console fellow Democrats who were alarmed by the former president's stunning comeback.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, Nov 7 (Reuters) - U.S. President Joe Biden urged Americans to "bring down the temperature" on Thursday following Republican Donald Trump's election victory and sought to console fellow De… [+8086 chars]
